pages.text: $(key)Spell Prism$() allows your spell damage to $(bold)pierce$() magic defense.$(br2)A $(key)Spell Prism$() can only be used $(bold)4$() times. You cannot enchant it with $(bold)Mending$() or $(bold)Spell Mending$(). However, it is cheap to craft and is an effective early-game way to break through enemy defenses.

In addition, $(key)Spell Prism$() can $(bold)enhance$() the effects of some $(key)generic school$() spells:$(br)$(list)$(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$(): locates a random destination.$(br)$(list)$(mage/spell#summon)Spell Summon$(): spawners will no longer be broke after their remaining count reaches zero.$(br)$(list)$(mage/spell#break)Remote Destruction$(): applies Silk Touch when breaking blocks.$(br)$(list)Spell Light: covers a larger area.
